resources.string: Here you can make some settings which change the app behavior\n\nThey will be saved automatically as soon as you select something.
Difficulty: easy\n\nThe texts are simply written. Questions in the quiz are easy.
Difficulty: Medium-Hard\n\nThe texts contain technical words and are written in an academic way. Questions in the quiz are medium to difficult.
Thank you for using our app!

With this app, you will learn about the world of sustainability. If you have used this app before, then you are an Experienced User. If not, then we recommend you take the journey to get to know the app a bit.

Before you can use this app you need to answer a few questions first, but don\'t worry, it won\'t take long either.\n\nThis question will determine the difficulty of the readable content and the feasible quizzes.
How well do you know sustainability?
I still have little knowledge and don\'t know it that well!
I already have some knowledge and know my way around!
Here you can view all your collected stickers. Stickers are challenges you can complete by using the app.\n\nHave fun collecting them!
Read the text about the bees
Successfully complete a quiz on the topic of bees
Successfully complete a quiz on the theme of forest fires

Hello, nice to meet you.\n\nWe are a small team of 3 students who have developed this app as part of our studies at the Jade University in Wilhelmshaven. It serves as an exam for the elective subject Mobile Applications.
Here you can see the most frequently asked questions about the app. We hope this helps you.
How do I transfer my stickers to another phone?

To do this, you just need to go to the settings and generate a transfer code.

Then enter it in your new phone and voila, your data is now on the new phone.

Have fun :)
How do I change the difficulty level?
To change the difficulty level you have to select either Superhero or Sidekick in the settings.
Will my stickers be lost if I get another phone?

To avoid losing your stickers, you can transfer them to your new phone.

Just generate a transfer code in the settings and enter it on your new phone.

After that, your stickers will be on your new phone.
